title: Use Trivets to Keep Your Cookware Scratch Free During Storage
description:
Tired of scratching up your cookware during storage?

Simply place trivets between your pots and pans when you put them away!

asset.author: OXO
asset.hookText:
Tired of scratching up your cookware during storage?

Simply place trivets between your pots and pans when you put them away!
